summary:
Experienced petrophysicist with a passion for learning and development.

After graduating in applied geophysics at Delft university of Technology I worked with Shell as a Petrophysicist. I have gained petroleum engineering experience in a wide variety of projects, set around the globe. 
I've used my technical experience and passion for learning to develop and facilitate training courses at Shell Learning.
I worked as coordinator Learning and Employment for IRO and Nogepa educating and enthusing Dutch students about the wider oil and gas industry while also working with learning institutes to match the demands of the industry.
Currently I am working as a lecturer at the Haagse hogeschool, faculty of industrial engineering.


Specialties: 
* Petroleum engineering/ Petrophysics
* Learning and Development
* Coaching and facilitation.
